article.title: Akita
article.paragraph: wiktionaryAkitaakitanihongo'''Akita'''秋田autumn ricefieldis a Japanese name and may refer to:
article.heading: People
Places

list.listitem: Akita Prefecture, JapanAkita, Akita(nihongo秋田市), its capital city
Akita Domain, also known as Kubota Domain
Akita, Kumamotonihongo飽田町, a former town in Kumamoto Prefecture

article.heading: Other uses

list.listitem: Akita (dog), a large spitz breed of dog originating from the mountainous northern regions of Japan
Akita Shoten, a Japanese publishing company
Our Lady of Akita, Marian apparitions
